医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
健康的社会决定因素是否影响了 COVID-19 疫苗的接种？研究人员调查了对 SARS-CoV-2 感染具有社会和医学易感性的个体中 COVID-19 疫苗接种情况的临床显着预测因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/Have-social-determinants-of-health-affected-COVID-19-vaccine-uptake.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/Have-social-determinants-of-health-affected-COVID-19-vaccine-uptake.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=546b1fb4-34cd-47bb-9232-fb8457ae5461 Thu, 10 Aug 2023 04:09:00 -0400 Have social determinants of health affected COVID-19 vaccine uptake?
MaxCyte 与 Lyell Nutrition 签署战略平台许可MaxCyte, Inc. 是一家专注于细胞工程的领先公司，提供支持平台技术，以推进下一代细胞疗法的发现、开发和商业化，并支持创新的细胞研究。获得临床阶段 T 细胞重编程公司 Lyell Nutrition, Inc. 的平台许可 (SPL)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/MaxCyte-signs-strategic-platform-license-with-Lyell-Immunopharma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/MaxCyte-signs-strategic-platform-license-with-Lyell-Immunopharma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd274df5-c367-4825-a099-373cc8b1e62e Thu, 10 Aug 2023 03:59:00 -0400 MaxCyte signs strategic platform license with Lyell Immunopharma
MaxCyte 和 Vittoria Biotherapeutics 签署战略平台许可证，以推进下一代细胞疗法MaxCyte, Inc. 是一家专注于细胞工程的领先公司，提供支持平台技术，以推进下一代细胞疗法的发现、开发和商业化，并支持创新的细胞研究和 Vittoria Biotherapeutics (Vittoria)，一家领先的基因编辑细胞治疗公司，拥有新颖的平台技术，准备为肿瘤学和免疫学适应症开发一系列高度差异化的细胞疗法，今天宣布签署 MaxCyte 的 Flow Electroporation® 技术的战略平台许可 (SPL) 和Vittoria Biotherapeutics 的 ExPERT™ 平台。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/MaxCyte-and-Vittoria-Biotherapeutics-sign-strategic-platform-license-to-advance-next- Generation-cellular-therapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/MaxCyte-and-Vittoria-Biotherapeutics-sign-strategic-platform-license-to-advance-next- Generation-cellular-therapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8831e472-fd5c-4c0f-af9f-ee09bbf241b1 Thu, 10 Aug 2023 03:50:00 -0400 MaxCyte and Vittoria Biotherapeutics sign strategic platform license to advance next generation cellular therapies
MaxCyte 与 Prime Medicine 签署战略平台许可，为患者推进下一代基因编辑疗法MaxCyte, Inc. 是一家专注于细胞工程的领先公司，提供支持平台技术，以推进下一代细胞疗法的发现、开发和商业化，并支持创新的细胞研究。与 Prime Medicine, Inc. 合作，Prime Medicine, Inc. 是一家致力于提供新型差异化一次性治疗性基因疗法的生物技术公司。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/MaxCyte-signs-strategic-platform-license-with-prime-medicine-to-advance-next- Generation-gene-editing-therapies-for-病人。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/MaxCyte-signs-strategic-platform-license-with-prime-medicine-to-advance-next- Generation-gene-editing-therapies-for-病人。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d5c7bac4-7259-47fa-98b2-d707af5c96fa Thu, 10 Aug 2023 03:40:00 -0400 MaxCyte signs strategic platform license with prime medicine to advance next-generation gene editing therapies for patients
长期使用胃酸反流药物可能会增加痴呆风险根据 2023 年 8 月 9 日发表的新研究，与不服用质子泵抑制剂的胃酸反流药物的人相比，服用质子泵抑制剂四年半或更久的人患痴呆症的风险可能更高，美国神经病学学会的医学杂志 Neurology® 在线期刊。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/Dementia-risk-may-increase-with-long-term-use-of-acid-reflux-drugs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/Dementia-risk-may-increase-with-long-term-use-of-acid-reflux-drugs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e5721fa7-b474-49df-a7f0-341d1beb5b25 Wed, 09 Aug 2023 23:05:50 -0400 Dementia risk may increase with long-term use of acid reflux drugs
Tau PET 显示出早期诊断和治疗阿尔茨海默病的希望阿尔茨海默病是最常见的神经退行性疾病之一，会导致记忆力和自主能力逐渐丧失。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/Tau-PET-shows-promise-for-early-diagnosis-and-treatment-of-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/Tau-PET-shows-promise-for-early-diagnosis-and-treatment-of-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c2e78875-df15-49e6-8f50-213a3da0b892 Wed, 09 Aug 2023 23:01:21 -0400 Tau PET shows promise for early diagnosis and treatment of Alzheimer's disease
果蝇研究提供了对 piRNA 生产和生育力的见解您可能熟悉 RNA，这种分子在蛋白质生产和基因表达控制中发挥着重要作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/Fruit-fly-study-provides-insights-into-piRNA-product-and-fertility.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/Fruit-fly-study-provides-insights-into-piRNA-product-and-fertility.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b458389a-95ca-4762-9ac3-39791ab1f68b Wed, 09 Aug 2023 22:09:41 -0400 Fruit fly study provides insights into piRNA production and fertility
即使在周末，睡眠不足也会影响心血管健康无论是工作还是娱乐，都会让我们在一周内无法获得足够的睡眠，如果我们认为可以通过周末睡懒觉来弥补，那就错了。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/Sleep-deprivation-affects-cardioangio-health-even-when-caught-up-on-weekends.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/Sleep-deprivation-affects-cardioangio-health-even-when-caught-up-on-weekends.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=89961fec-c484-412d-a29c-2cc46c431cf0 Wed, 09 Aug 2023 22:04:54 -0400 Sleep deprivation affects cardiovascular health even when caught up on weekends
与阿尔茨海默氏症相关的基因也可能对生育有好处先前的研究表明，载脂蛋白-ε4 (APOE-ε4) 等位基因会增加老年人患多种疾病的风险，特别是阿尔茨海默病和心血管疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/Gene-linked-to-Alzheimers-may-also-have-fertility-benefits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/Gene-linked-to-Alzheimers-may-also-have-fertility-benefits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ef25470d-c6c4-47c0-a3ff-ffd2a6efc8ec Wed, 09 Aug 2023 22:01:03 -0400 Gene linked to Alzheimer's may also have fertility benefits
研究在基因疗法治疗血液疾病的新方法上取得了突破密歇根医学院、费城儿童医院和宾夕法尼亚大学医学院的专家进行的研究正在通过基因疗法治疗镰状细胞性贫血等血液疾病的新方法取得突破。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/Research-breaks-ground-on-new-ways-of-treating-blood-disorders-with-gene-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/Research-breaks-ground-on-new-ways-of-treating-blood-disorders-with-gene-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=af77cd3b-8e4c-4749-ab19-768fd1ccef3a Wed, 09 Aug 2023 21:54:21 -0400 Research breaks ground on new ways of treating blood disorders with gene therapy
